title: TrialX2 v2.15 Final By bobiras2009
description:
#1 Racing Game!

Top chart - #1 Racing game in more than 30 countries!

With over 25,000,000 downloads for the Trial Xtreme series,
Trial Xtreme 2 is the sequel to multi-million selling hit Trial Xtreme, packed with more levels, amazing new graphics and more blistering motorcycle stunt action than ever.
Crank up the throttle, rev your engine and negotiate your way across 36 new action-packed levels.
Trial Xtreme 2 uses the cutting edge NVIDIAÃ‚Â® PhysXÃ‚Â® engine to give you the most realistic ride of your life, demanding skill and concentration to take to take your bike riding skills to the max!
